biography: Zaheeda Hussain, commonly known by her mononym Zaheeda, is a former actress of Hindi films. Born in Mumbai, she is the daughter of Akhtar Hussain, who was a film producer and the son of director Jaddanbai. Actress Nargis was her aunt and character actor Anwar Hussain her uncle.
